data.name: ExternalDirective_Description
data.value: Directive to indicate that a field is owned by another service, for example via Apollo federation.

data.name: FieldsetType_Description
data.value: Scalar representing a set of fields.

data.name: KeyDirective_Description
data.value: Used to indicate a combination of fields that can be used to uniquely identify and fetch an object or interface.

data.name: ProvidesDirective_Description
data.value: Used to annotate the expected returned fieldset from a field on a base type that is guaranteed to be selectable by the federation gateway.

data.name: RequiresDirective_Description
data.value: Used to annotate the required input fieldset from a base type for a resolver.

data.name: EntityType_Description
data.value: Union of all types that key directive applied. This information is needed by the Apollo federation gateway.

data.name: ThrowHelper_FieldSet_HasInvalidFormat
data.value: The fieldset has an invalid format.

data.name: ThrowHelper_Scalar_CannotParseValue
data.value: {0} cannot parse the given value of type `{1}`

data.name: ThrowHelper_Key_FieldSet_CannotBeEmpty
data.value: The key attribute is used on `{0}` without specifying the the field set.

data.name: ThrowHelper_Provides_FieldSet_CannotBeEmpty
data.value: FieldSet is null or empty on type

data.name: ThrowHelper_Requires_FieldSet_CannotBeEmpty
data.value: FieldSet is null or empty on type

data.name: FieldDescriptorExtensions_Key_FieldSet_CannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: Value cannot be null or empty.

data.name: FieldDescriptorExtensions_Requires_FieldSet_CannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: Value cannot be null or empty.

data.name: FieldDescriptorExtensions_Provides_FieldSet_CannotBeNullOrEmpty
data.value: Value cannot be null or empty.

data.name: ThrowHelper_EntityType_NoEntities
data.value: The schema has no types with a KeyDirective and therefor no entities. Apollo federation requires at least on entity.

data.name: ServiceType_Description
data.value: This type provides a field named sdl: String! which exposes the SDL of the service's schema. This SDL (schema definition language) is a printed version of the service's schema including the annotations of federation directives. This SDL does not include the additions of the federation spec.

data.name: ThrowHelper_EntityResolver_NoEntityResolverFound
data.value: The apollo gateway tries to resolve an entity for which no EntityResolver method was found.

data.name: EntityResolver_MustBeMethod
data.value: The EntityResolver must be a method. Please check if the EntityResolverAttribute is correctly set to a method.

data.name: ThrowHelper_Any_HasInvalidFormat
data.value: The given any representation has an invalid format.

data.name: Any_Description
data.value: The _Any scalar is used to pass representations of entities from external services into the root _entities field for execution. Validation of the _Any scalar is done by matching the __typename and @external fields defined in the schema.
